dialogues.text: Portal exit confirmed: Location updated. Current environment: unfamiliar.
No surprise there. What do you see ahead?
Scans indicate multiple lifeforms in the vicinity. Warning: Unidentified species show defensive patterns.
Recommendation: Approach cautiously. Territorial behavior observed. Animals may attempt to chase you, but will likely tire quickly. Plants are much less forgiving.
Great, so just don't get in their way, and Iâ€™ll be fine. Got it.
